| Status                  = Defunct

| Allies                  = [[Accuser Corps (Earth-616)|Accuser Corps]], [[Kree/Skrull Alliance (Earth-616)|Alliance]], [[Imperial Kree Army (Earth-616)|Kree Army]], [[Skrull Empire]], [[Vox (Super-Inhumans) (Earth-616)|Vox]]
| Enemies                 = [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]],{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 10 12|16}} [[House of Agon (Earth-616)|Inhuman Royal Family]], [[Kree Empire]]
| Origin                  = A new empire created by [[Kree]] renegades
| PlaceOfFormation        = Ruins of [[Hala (Planet)|Hala]]
| PlaceOfDissolution      = 
| Creators                = Donny Cates; Ariel Olivetti
| First                   = Death of Inhumans Vol 1 1

| History                 = When [[Kree]] members of the [[Imperial Kree Army (Earth-616)|Kree Army]] returned home to see that their beloved planet of [[Hala (Planet)|Hala]] had been totally destroyed they became disillusioned by the [[We-Plex Supreme Intelligence System (Earth-200080)|Supreme Intelligence]] and his followers, such as [[Ronan (Earth-616)|Ronan]], and sought to rebuild the great Kree society.{{r|Death of Inhumans Vol 1 2}} They sought to use the remaining [[Inhumans (Inhomo supremis)|Inhumans]] to turn them into the [[Super-Inhumans]] to use them against the [[Kree Empire]], whom they called them the old Kree, in their [[Kree Civil War]].{{r|Death of Inhumans Vol 1 1|3}}{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Annual Vol 3 1}} However, [[Blackagar Boltagon (Earth-616)|Black Bolt]] was unwilling to let his people to be used or murdered and so he destroyed the Imperium's stronghold where the Inhumans were held.{{r|Death of Inhumans Vol 1 5}}

The Imperium and the Utopian Kree eventually established a ceasefire by the new leader of the Imperium, [[Theodore Altman (Earth-616)|Dorrek VIII]],{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 6 1}} after it was merged with the [[Skrull Empire]] to form the [[Kree/Skrull Alliance (Earth-616)|Alliance]].{{r|Incoming Vol 1 1}}{{r|Empyre Vol 1 1}}
